author: zongaro
msg: Bringing branch up-to-date with changes from MAIN branch.

author: zongaro
msg: When converting a run of characters in a FastStringBuffer to a java.lang.String,
check whether all the characters are in the same chunk.  If so, there's no
need to create a StringBuffer into which to copy them - the subpart of the
chunk can be converted to String directly more efficiently.

author: zongaro
msg: Moved some less frequently used code out of addNode method into separate

author: zongaro
msg: Split loops in next() method of most typed iterators into two - one to handle
matching against expanded type ID's and another to handle matching against DTM
node types.  The two can be handled more efficiently separately.
Also fixed bug in PrecedingIterator.gotoMark; the _stack was being changed
by the operation, even though it's not actually supposed to change during the
course of execution of the iterator.

author: zongaro
msg: Split loop in getTypedFirstChild in two - one to handle matching against an
expanded type ID and a second to handle matching against a DTM node type.  The
two cases can be handled more efficiently separately.
